June 26, 2011

adriannantan.com

A friend says, “you just need an excuse to get another blog”.

Well, he’s right. I thus present adriannatan.com, which will be my new home for all writing about business, tech, entrepreneurship, the tech business, the startups I’m trying to run, and other things like that. I aim to try to write an essay there every Tuesday. Check it out.
